summary: Adds a simple standalone follower in the Vilemyr Inn in Ivarstead.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][i][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Uni Followers - Sylvana[/size][/color][/i][/b][/center]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58468-2-1412612748.jpg[/img]

[b][size=4]Description:[/size][/b]

Sylvana is a custom standalone Breton follower that resides in the Vilemyr inn.
She's good at archery and one-handed, wears simple Leather armor with an iron dagger and a longbow and some iron arrows. You'll have to get better equipment for your followers yourself!
The CBBE body option is a custom body I made with Bodyslide.
No custom voice or anything, as I don't have the resources to do this.


[b][size=4]Installation:[/size][/b]

[b][size=2]Manual:[/size][/b] Extract the content of the folder inside the archive to your Skyrim Data directory.
[b][size=2]NMM:[/size][/b] Install. It's fairly straightforward.


[b][size=4]Requirements:[/size][/b]

Nothing. At all.


[b][size=4]Credits for assets used, and many thanks to:[/size]
[/b]
KS Hairdos: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?[/url]

[/url]UNPB Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?[/url]

[/url][b]Armor used in Screenshot:[/b]
